EmailTemplate.subject: Your link to the "Retail Apps Report" by Pivotal Labs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Download Your Free Report from Pivotal Labs <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/US-Retail-Apps-Report-2014-Pivotal-Labs.pdf>
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your interest in the "U.S. Retail Apps Report 2014" by Pivotal Labs.
Click here to access this report <http://pivotallabs.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/US-Retail-Apps-Report-2014-Pivotal-Labs.pdf>.
If you have any questions, reply to this email and we'll respond right away.
Sincerely, Imtiaz Jaffer Director of Marketing
